Film Festival, TRANSCENDENT MAN has drawn critical acclaim. It screened to sold-out audiences at Tribeca, the American Film Festival in Los Angeles and the International Documentary Film Festival in Amsterdam. The film was lauded as one of the top ten documentaries of the year, by the International Documentary Association. Barry Ptolemy explores the social and philosophical implications and the potential threats technological advances pose to human civilization in interviews with world leader Colin Powell ; technologists Hugo de Garis , Peter Diamandis , Kevin Warwick , and Dean Kamen ;

the APC, said that Mike Pence 's ability to unite the three traditional areas of conservatism- fiscal, foreign policy, and social- make him an ideal candidate for the nation's newly energized conservatives. Mike Pence describes himself as ''First a Christian, then a conservative, then a Republican.' He unifies fiscal, social, and national security conservatives, and will energize the conservative coalition essential to winning back The White House in 2012, Benko said in the release. Mike Pence has been on people's lips here in Iowa, said Steffen Schmidt , a political blogger and a political science professor at Iowa State University. Despite the buzz, however, Steffen Schmidt adds that Mike Pence would still have to prove his staying power. ''

win the nomination, but that a strong challenge could benefit him. ''I think primaries can have the opportunity of raising the issues and making the Democratic candidate a stronger candidate,'' Dennis Kucinich said. I think it's safe to predict that Barack Obama will be the nominee of the Democratic Party, but he could be a stronger nominee if he receives a strong challenge in the primary. Dennis Kucinich did not say who that potential challenger might be. Former Russ Feingold ( D-Wis.) has been mentioned as a possible 2012 challenger but he has said he does not want to run. Sen. completed a four-point play that made it 61-39 http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight_Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. ''You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''
